header.title: About Shelby
header.tagline: Creating art that speaks to the soul
header.summary: I'm a passionate painter who finds inspiration in the world around me. Through my art, I explore the intersection of emotion, color, and form to create pieces that resonate with viewers on a deep level.

story.title: My Artistic Journey
paragraphs: My love for painting began in childhood, where I found solace and expression through colors and brushstrokes. What started as a simple fascination with how light danced across surfaces has evolved into a lifelong passion for capturing the essence of life through art.

I draw inspiration from the natural world, human emotions, and the interplay between light and shadow. Each painting is a dialogue between my inner vision and the canvas, resulting in works that blend realism with abstract elements to tell unique stories.

Over the years, I've developed my own distinctive style that combines traditional techniques with contemporary approaches. Whether working in oils, acrylics, or mixed media, I strive to create pieces that not only please the eye but also touch the heart and provoke thought.
story.studioCaption: My studio space where creativity flows freely

items.title: Color & Emotion
items.description: I believe that color is the language of emotion. Each hue carries its own story and energy, which I harness to convey feelings and moods in my paintings.

items.title: Light & Shadow
items.description: The interplay of light and shadow fascinates me. I use contrast not just as a technical element, but as a metaphor for the complexities of life itself.

items.title: Texture & Form
items.description: Through varied brushstrokes and mixed media techniques, I create textures that invite viewers to not just see, but almost feel the surface of my paintings.

items.question: Do you accept commissions?
items.answer: Yes! I love creating custom pieces. Commission timelines typically range from 4-8 weeks depending on size and complexity. Please contact me with your ideas and I'll provide a detailed quote.

items.question: Are your paintings for sale?
items.answer: Most of my gallery pieces are available for purchase. Prices vary based on size, medium, and complexity. Contact me for current availability and pricing information.

items.question: Do you ship internationally?
items.answer: Yes, I can arrange international shipping for my artwork. Shipping costs and insurance will be calculated based on the destination and piece size.

items.question: Can I visit your studio?
items.answer: I offer studio visits by appointment for serious collectors and those interested in commissioning work. Please reach out to schedule a visit.

items.question: Do you teach art classes?
items.answer: I occasionally offer workshops and private lessons. Follow my social media or sign up for my newsletter to stay updated on upcoming opportunities.

items.question: How do you handle payment?
items.answer: For purchases and commissions, I typically require a 50% deposit to begin work, with the balance due upon completion. I accept various payment methods including bank transfers and major credit cards.
